CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL(ABN__c) || ISBLANK(ABN__c), HYPERLINK("http://www.abr.business.gov.au/SearchByName.aspx?SearchText=" & Name , "Click here for details"), HYPERLINK("http://www.abr.business.gov.au/SearchByABN.aspx?SearchText=" & ABN__c , "Click here for details"))
CustomField.label: ABR Lookup
